name: Alex
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the happy moments and optimistic energy will always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy stuffyyy thingsyy
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.^_^
